title: New champion teaser out, ornn the mountainsmith
body:
From the teaser i can speculate

Thats hes

A freljord
Some form of god
Could be a tank or support
Maybe his kit revolves around forging temporary items as buffs for himself and/or allies?

Sounds cool.keen to see what he looks like and what his kit is

replies.body:
I think his class is  'Vanguard' _(whatever that means... Im so lost now with 'enchanter' and 'warden' and all the other new sub-sub-classes)_
But all cording to their Roadmap, the next champion is scheduled to be a Vanguard.

It all just confuses me, it seems like whenever a champ does too much damage or has too much CC for the class there supposed to be, rather than nerfing them, they just slap them with a new class name and pretend its not OP.
Ill just stick with _"Tank, Fighter, ADC, Mage, Assassin, Support"_ thanks ^^

_____

But yea nah, the Freljord is an interesting place, and I'm pretty sure the last champ we had from there was Gnar, and that was a long time ago, so it'll be cool to see a brand new Freljord champ. 

It'll be cool if he is some kind of Drawf-smith, or perhaps a Thor-like figure, as both are predominant 'godly' figures in norse mythology. Although that's what id _expect_, and recently Riot has been making such interesting champs that no one could foresee, like Xayah and Rakan. 

It'll be interesting. ^^
